name: CreateAbTestVariation
description:
Create a new A/B test variation in HubSpot CMS.

This tool allows you to create a new A/B test variation for a landing page using HubSpot CMS. It should be called when you need to perform A/B testing by generating different page variations to assess their performance.

parameters.name: ab_test_variation_name
parameters.description: The name of the A/B test variation to be created.

parameters.name: object_test_id
parameters.description: The ID of the object to be tested in the A/B test variation.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to test.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: ID of the object to test.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to test.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
